column4: hey guys..ive tried installing all versions of ubuntu 64 bit and it will install..but when i put another stick of ram in..it locks
how big are the sticks ? are they paired ? are they overclocked ?
how big are the memory sticks ?
and what about the 2 x 1gig sticks
it sounds like the second memory controller is having an issue
is this an amd or intel cpu
so the controller is on the chip
is this overclocked in any way shape or form
what happens when you try to use ubuntu with 2 or 3 sticks in.
define locks please, just so we are clear
does the keyboard numlock go on / off with numlock button
does the window manager respond to ctrl+alt+backspace
ok, so what you need to do is reboot using safe mode and tell me how that works ?
